attributes.action: people suffering with psoriasis should be taken more seriously
attributes.additional_details:
As i am a psoriasis sufferer myself, i feel like doctors don't really bother with it,they'll just give u cream and that's it.more should be done,more should be explained to psoriasis sufferers, there are treatments,there are things that can be done to make it better,yes there's no cure,but changes to a lifestyle can make it better,such as diets and exercise.i was not told this by a doctor i had to do research myself,what to eat what not to eat etc.
its not easy living psoriasis it can be extremely depressing and you can totally loose your confidence and it also affects the people around me and people i love. More help should be provided.

rejection.details: Additionally,should you wish to resubmit this petition, please do so using your full names
